html:
The Artist's Eye

A collection by Vickie Dorsett, capturing moments of profound beauty.
css: .feature-thumb-gallery-section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #FFFFFF; padding: 4rem 2rem; } .feature-thumb-gallery-container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; } .feature-thumb-gallery-text { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .feature-thumb-gallery-text h1 { font-size: 2.8rem; color: #212529; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; } .feature-thumb-gallery-text p { font-size: 1.2rem; color: #6C757D; } .feature-thumb-gallery-main-image { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; width: 100%; height: 60vh; overflow: hidden; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .feature-thumb-gallery-main-image img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; transition: opacity 0.4s ease; } .feature-thumb-gallery-strip { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1rem; flex-wrap: nowrap; overflow-x: auto; padding-bottom: 1rem; } .thumbnail-image { width: 100px; height: 75px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; border: 2px solid transparent; transition: border-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease; opacity: 0.6; } .thumbnail-image:hover { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 1; } .thumbnail-image.active { border-color: #007BFF; opacity: 1; } @media (max-width: 768px) { .feature-thumb-gallery-section { padding: 2rem 1rem; } .feature-thumb-gallery-text h1 { font-size: 2rem; } .feature-thumb-gallery-main-image { height: 40vh; } .thumbnail-image { width: 80px; height: 60px; } }
js: window.addEventListener('load', () => { const pixabayImages = document.querySelectorAll('img[src^="https://pixabay.com/api/"]'); pixabayImages.forEach(img => { const apiUrl = img.src; fetch(apiUrl).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { if (data.hits && data.hits.length > 0) { img.dataset.largeUrl = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; img.src = data.hits[0].webformatURL; if (img.id === 'main-feature-image' || img.classList.contains('active')) { document.getElementById('main-feature-image').src = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; } } else { img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/640x360?text=Error'; } }).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching Pixabay image:', error); img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/640x360?text=Error'; }); }); const mainImage = document.getElementById('main-feature-image'); const thumbnails = document.querySelectorAll('.thumbnail-image'); thumbnails.forEach(thumb => { thumb.addEventListener('click', () => { if (thumb.dataset.largeUrl) { mainImage.style.opacity = 0; setTimeout(() => { mainImage.src = thumb.dataset.largeUrl; mainImage.style.opacity = 1; }, 400); } thumbnails.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active')); thumb.classList.add('active'); }); }); });
